title: Hextech Crash and Recent Queue Errors
body:
Hey Guys,

Lately i have been getting a sorta crash problem when i am in my client menu, i go to click on hextech once i have clicked it my client crashes randomly. i have to restart it and i click on hextech and it crashes again. and recently i have gotten a lot of queue errors after about 1 minute of Q time it just kicks me out of my group and comes up with a error that says "*Group Disbanded*" when i am solo queue or duo queue. is there any known reason why this is happening because im starting to get irritated by it and it annoys me when i am streaming games.

Thanks
